Package com.edugility.throwables

Provides classes and interfaces useful for working with Throwables.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ThrowableList An AbstractList formed by a Throwable and its causal chain.
Throwables A class to assist with processing Throwable instances.
 

Exception Summary
ThrowableChain An Exception (and an implementation of the Collection interface) that also holds a modifiable list of other affiliated Throwables that are not connected to the direct causal chain, but are related in some way nonetheless.
 

Package com.edugility.throwables Description

Provides classes and interfaces useful for working with Throwables.

Author:
Laird Nelson
